00148 inline bool nonzerop(Cell* const c)
00149 {

00151     assert_cellnotnull("Given c was null", c);

00153     throw_error(e.what(), "cons.hpp::nonzerop(Cell*)");

00155

00256 inline Operation get_operation(string const opr)
00257 {
00258   if (opr == "+") {
00259     return add_opr;
00260   } else if (opr == "if") {
00261     return if_opr;
00262   } else if (opr == "ceiling") {
00263     return ceil_opr;
00264   } else if (opr == "-") {
00265     return minus_opr;
00266   } else if (opr == "*") {
00267     return multiply_opr;
00268   } else if (opr == "/") {
00269     return divide_opr;
00270   } else if (opr == "floor") {
00271     return floor_opr;
00272   } else if (opr == "quote") {
00273     return quote_opr;
00274   } else if (opr == "cons") {
00275     return cons_opr;
00276   } else if (opr == "car") {
00277     return car_opr;
00278   } else if (opr == "cdr") {
00279     return cdr_opr;
00280   } else if (opr == "nullp") {
00281     return nullp_opr;
00282   } else if (opr == "define") {
00283     return define_opr;
00284   } else if (opr == "<") {
00285     return lessthan_opr;
00286   } else if (opr == "not") {
00287     return not_opr;
00288   } else if (opr == "print") {
00289     return print_opr;
00290   } else if (opr == "eval") {
00291     return eval_opr;
00292   } else if (opr == "lambda") {
00293     return lambda_opr;
00294   } else if (opr == "apply") {
00295     return apply_opr;
00296   } else if (opr == "let") {
00297     return let_opr;
00298   } else {
00299     return undefined_opr;
00300   }
00301 }

00349 inline int list_size(Cell* const c)
00350 {
00351   int size = 0;
00352   Cell* curr = c;
00353 
00354   while(!nullp(curr)) {
00355     ++size;
00356     if (!listp(curr)) {
00357       return size;
00358     } else {
00359       curr = cdr(curr);
00360     }
00361   }
00362 
00363   return size;
00364 }

00371 inline Cell* clone_cell(Cell* const c)
00372 {
00373   if (nullp(c)) {
00374     return nil;
00375   }
00376   return c->clone();
00377 }

00399 inline Cell* cell_apply(Cell* const c, Cell* const args)
00400 {
00401   Cell* procedure = nil;
00402   try {
00403     assert_cellnotnull("Cannot apply null", c);
00404     
00405     // Extra evaluation to ensure c was not a symbol referring to the function.
00406     // Simple eval() of a procedure only returns a copy.
00407     procedure = c;
00408   } catch (runtime_error& e) {
00409     throw_error(e.what(), "cons.hpp::cell_apply(Cell*)");
00410   }
00411 
00412   return procedure->apply(args);
00413 }
